mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gray Matter
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Karen Holzberg has always been fascinated with the human form and the implicit drama of Italian renaissance art. Holzberg's works such as Gray Matter depict a three quarter view of a young man gazing upward as if toward Heaven, highlighting the strength and vulnerability of the human body.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Virginia
Art
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
